scripts.gen-git-evals: if command -v infisical >/dev/null 2>&1; then infisical run -- bun run git-evals/gen-evals.ts; else bun run git-evals/gen-evals.ts; fi
scripts.run-git-evals: if command -v infisical >/dev/null 2>&1; then infisical run -- bun run git-evals/run-git-evals.ts; else bun run git-evals/run-git-evals.ts; fi
scripts.run-eval-set: if command -v infisical >/dev/null 2>&1; then infisical run -- bun run git-evals/run-eval-set.ts; else bun run git-evals/run-eval-set.ts; fi
